validation.pskInvalid: Please enter a valid {{bits}} bit PSK.

role.label: Роль
role.description: Device telemetry is sent over PRIMARY. Only one PRIMARY allowed

name.label: Ім'я
name.description: A unique name for the channel <12 bytes, leave blank for default

uplinkEnabled.label: Uplink Enabled
uplinkEnabled.description: Send messages from the local mesh to MQTT

downlinkEnabled.label: Downlink Enabled
downlinkEnabled.description: Send messages from MQTT to the local mesh

positionPrecision.label: Місце розташування
positionPrecision.description: The precision of the location to share with the channel. Can be disabled.
